      prototypeNode - Lambda event as JSON string, as it arrive in the Lambda input stream

      Throws:
      IOException - when JSON deserialization to objects fails

    • extractDynamoEvents

      public static List<com.amazonaws.services.lambda.runtime.events.DynamodbEvent> extractDynamoEvents​(InputStream input) throws IOException
      extracts DynamodbEvents from JSON structure
      Parameters:
      input - the Lambda event as JSON with all the DynamodbEvents; could be multiple when comming from SQS source
      Returns:
      list with all the DynamodbEvent deserialized from JSON
      Throws:
      IOException - from serialization processes

    • extractS3Event

      public static com.amazonaws.services.lambda.runtime.events.S3Event extractS3Event​(InputStream input) throws IOException
      extracts S3Events from JSON structure
      Parameters:
      input - input the Lambda event as JSON with all the DynamodbEvents; the structure is different, depending on the source: SNS, S3, other Lambda
      Returns:
      list with all the S3Events deserialized from JSON
      Throws:
      IOException - from serialization processes
